channel.title: The True Story about what happened to FrugooScape!
channel.description:
First off, FrugooScape forums are back up, just not the game.
FrugooScape was asked by Jagex to remove the game client or they will be sued. Al did what they said, and hes got his Lawyers talking to Jagex and seeing if there is a legal way to keep FrugooScape.
Want to here this from Al? go to...
http://frugooscape.net/forums/showthread.php?t=17276

item.title: The True Story about what happened to FrugooScape!
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

The server was fine, profit = bad, webclient = bad

Read full topic
item.source: The True Story about what happened to FrugooScape!

item.title: The True Story about what happened to FrugooScape!
item.dc:creator: @link-in-sg link-in-sg
item.description:
@link-in-sg wrote:

Yeah, Basically for all those people who don’t want to read. They told him to take off because it was way to close to looking like Runescape. Basically having everything look the same as it did in the old runescape before the new graphics came in.

Read full topic
item.source: The True Story about what happened to FrugooScape!
